import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { FormControl, FormGroup, Validators } from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'app-createbook', templateUrl: './createbook.component.html', styleUrls: ['./createbook.component.css'] }) export class CreatebookComponent { createBookForm=new FormGroup({ title:new FormControl("",[Validators.required]), code:new FormControl(""), publisher:new FormControl(""), category:new FormControl(""), content:new FormControl(""), price:new FormControl(""), }); createBook(){ console.log(this.createBookForm.value); } }
